metadata.title: CVE-2023-0461 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.description:
There is a use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux Kernel which can beexploited to achieve local privilege escalation. To reach the vulnerabilitykernel configuration flag CONFIG_TLS or CONFIG_XFRM_ESPINTCP has to beconfigured, but the operation does not require any privilege. There is ause-after-free bug of icsk_ulp_data of a struct inet_connection_sock. WhenCONFIG_TLS is enabled, user can install a tls context (struct tls_context)on a connected tcp socket. The context is not cleared if this socket isdisconnected and reused as a listener. If a new socket is created from thelistener, the context is inherited and vulnerable. The setsockopt TCP_ULPoperation does not require any privilege. We recommend upgrading pastcommit 2c02d41d71f90a5168391b6a5f2954112ba2307c

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0461` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500 - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500mc - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-smp - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-emb - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-smp - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.11.0-12.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-12.19').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-13.29~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1002.2').
linux-azure package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1162.177~14.04.1').
